text: Rudolf Edlinger (20 February 1940 â€“ 21 August 2021) was an Austrian politician. He was a member of the Social Democratic Party of Austria. He was the Finance Minister from 1997 until 2000. He was the president of the football club SK Rapid Wien between 2001 and 2013. He was born in Vienna. Edlinger died on 21 August 2021 in Vienna at the age of 81.Ex-Finanzminister Rudolf Edlinger tot ==References== ==Other websites== * Rudolf Edlinger biography - Austrian Parliament Category:1940 births Category:2021 deaths Category:People from Vienna Category:Austrian politicians Category:Austrian businesspeople
